overview_of_class: At the heart of materials science & engineering the understanding, design and manipulation of "microstructure", particularly down to nano- and atomic-scale. Naturally, this requires deep understanding of morphology, crystallography, structure, chemistry and electronic structure and associated phenomena at those length scales. This course is about advanced electron-beam based analytical tools and techniques which form the foundation for analysis of materials down to atomic scale. It is meant to be a "practical" and experimentally-driven introduction to diverse analytical techniques and their relevance to emerging materials problems.
name: Analytical Electron Microscopy
subject: MAT_SCI
